inlineContent.text: There is just one tutorial to adjust the app to your own needs.
There are some possibilities to adjust the app to your own needs.
The most important part there is the training of ML models for analysing texts.
After the chatbot is ready to use it would be suitable to test the models and to retrain them.
Therfore the user input is collected for retraining the models.

abstract.text: There is just one tutorial to adjust the app to your own needs.

abstract.text: The following steps describe what need to do to improve the chatbot and to adjust it to own needs
There are the following steps necessary:

doc://org.luenstedt.HotelChatBot/tutoria.title: What to do for improving the quality of the chatbot

abstract.text: A good ML model is trained from a large set of samples. So a developer is not able to create such a hugh
set. For this the app collects all the user input and creates training and testfiles when the app will terminate.
The disandvantage is that the end of the program is slow with a big set of data but this is only for the POC.
In a real world you have that in the background system and the user does not recognize that.
The created files can be used for retrain the models.
